title: Flight Into Danger
description: Captain Dunning had collapsed in the pilot's seat, but the voice at controls was We are in distress... At least five passengers are sick. Both pilots are unconscious and in serious condition. My name is George Spenser. I am a passenger on this airplane. I was a passenger. I am now the pilot. What happened? Who was the new pilot? Would anyone reach the ground alive?
author: Arthur Hailey
